protocol.name: P-GSE44116-1
protocol.text: RMA processing using R/Bioconductor ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 signal by RMA processing

protocol.name: P-GSE44116-2
protocol.text: 2-week-old whole plants were collected and frozen by liquid nitrogen.

protocol.name: P-GSE44116-3
protocol.text: Plants were grown on MS plates for 2 weeks under 16 h light/8 h dark at 22˚C.

protocol.name: P-GSE44116-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted using the RNeasy plant mini kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE44116-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were synthesized by GeneChip 3'IVT Express Kit （Affymetrix) from 250 ng (200 ng for sample '2EA1021_10', '4EA1021_11', '6EA1021_12') total RNA according to the manufacturer's instructions. Biotinylated cRNA yield were checked with the NanoDrop Spectrophotometer.

protocol.name: P-GSE44116-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug (5 ug for sample '2EA1021_10', '4EA1021_11', '6EA1021_12') of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45 degrees on GeneChip Arabidpsis ATH1 Gemome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE44116-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G.
